data_table.description: The pedigree data table shows family relationships through family IDs, subject IDs, father IDs, mother IDs, twin IDs, gender, and second degree relationships.

variable.name: FAMILY_ID
variable.comment: Note regarding Amish pedigree: All individuals can be connected in a 14-generation pedigree.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.comment: Note regarding Amish pedigree: All individuals can be connected in a 14-generation pedigree.

variable.name: FATHER
variable.comment: Note regarding Amish pedigree: All individuals can be connected in a 14-generation pedigree.

variable.name: MOTHER
variable.comment: Note regarding Amish pedigree: All individuals can be connected in a 14-generation pedigree.

variable.name: SEX
variable.comment: Note regarding Amish pedigree: All individuals can be connected in a 14-generation pedigree.

variable.name: MZTWIN
variable.comment: Note regarding Amish pedigree: All individuals can be connected in a 14-generation pedigree.

variable.name: DEGREE2
variable.description: Individual has unidentified second degree relationship with at least one other pedigree that is not represented in the pedigree information given.
variable.comment: Note regarding Amish pedigree: All individuals can be connected in a 14-generation pedigree.
